name: is-watching
author: O. Panfilova
description: Is Watching is a small webgl video game based on Anarchy-Engine.

scripts.before:release: npm run generate:legal:all && npm run prettier:changed
scripts.clean:all: rimraf packages/**/package-lock.json -g packages/**/node_modules -g packages/**/dist -g apps/**/package-lock.json -g apps/**/node_modules -g  ./node_modules  ./package-lock.json
scripts.clean:all-metadate: npm run e2e:clean-metadate --workspace=apps/showcases-e2e && npm run sanitize-assets --workspace=apps/showcases-desktop ** npm run sanitize-assets --workspace=apps/showcases-core && npm run sanitize-assets --workspace=packages/showcases- && npm run sanitize-assets --workspace=packages/showcases-gui
scripts.clean:all:restore: git add ./package-lock.json && find packages -type d -name node_modules -prune -false -o -type f -name package-lock.json -exec git add {} +
scripts.clean:reinstall: npm run clean:all && npm install && npm run clean:all:restore
scripts.generate:legal: npm run generate:legal:files && npm run generate:legal:sbom
scripts.generate:legal:all: npm run generate:legal && npm run generate:legal:anarchy-engine && npm run generate:legal:anarchy-i18n && npm run generate:legal:anarchy-tracking && npm run generate:legal:anarchy-legal && npm run generate:legal:anarchy-shared && npm run generate:legal:showcases-core && npm run generate:legal:showcases-desktop && npm run generate:legal:showcases-e2e && npm run generate:legal:showcases-i18n && npm run generate:legal:showcases-menu && npm run generate:legal:showcases-gui && npm run generate:legal:showcases-shared
scripts.pr:guard:ci: npm run prettier:check && npm run --workspaces --if-present pr:guard:ci
scripts.prettier:changed: git diff --name-only --diff-filter=ACMRTUXB HEAD | grep -E '\.(ts|tsx|js|json|css|scss|md)$' | xargs prettier --write
